title: Delhi's Imperial hotel goes in for a royal makeover
description: Launched in 1936 as the first hotel of New Delhi and boasting a guest list spanning the who's who of politics and Hollywood, The Imperial, on the Janpath, is undergoing an ambitious 'refurbishment'.
